hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Song of Time#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Zora Tunic#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Hookshot#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Deku Scrub Center

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #5# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #time#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that showing the #Mask of Truth in the Deku Theater# rewards #the Megaton Hammer#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Lens of Truth#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Slingshot#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #the Minuet of Forest#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Deku Tree#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
